cd <ROOT_DIR>/workdir/clusters/<CLUSTER_NAME> && etcd --advertise-client-urls=http://0.0.0.0:32765 --auto-compaction-retention=1 --data-dir=<ROOT_DIR>/workdir/clusters/<CLUSTER_NAME>/etcd --initial-advertise-peer-urls=http://0.0.0.0:32766 --initial-cluster=node0=http://0.0.0.0:32766 --listen-client-urls=http://0.0.0.0:32765 --listen-peer-urls=http://0.0.0.0:32766 --name=node0 --quota-backend-bytes=8589934592 ><ROOT_DIR>/workdir/clusters/<CLUSTER_NAME>/logs/etcd.log 2>&1 &
echo $! ><ROOT_DIR>/workdir/clusters/<CLUSTER_NAME>/pids/etcd.pid
cd <ROOT_DIR>/workdir/clusters/<CLUSTER_NAME> && kube-apiserver --allow-privileged=true --authorization-mode=Node,RBAC --bind-address=0.0.0.0 --client-ca-file=<ROOT_DIR>/workdir/clusters/<CLUSTER_NAME>/pki/ca.crt --etcd-prefix=/registry --etcd-servers=http://127.0.0.1:32765 --proxy-client-cert-file=<ROOT_DIR>/workdir/clusters/<CLUSTER_NAME>/pki/admin.crt --proxy-client-key-file=<ROOT_DIR>/workdir/clusters/<CLUSTER_NAME>/pki/admin.key --secure-port=32764 --service-account-issuer=https://kubernetes.default.svc.cluster.local --service-account-key-file=<ROOT_DIR>/workdir/clusters/<CLUSTER_NAME>/pki/admin.key --service-account-signing-key-file=<ROOT_DIR>/workdir/clusters/<CLUSTER_NAME>/pki/admin.key --tls-cert-file=<ROOT_DIR>/workdir/clusters/<CLUSTER_NAME>/pki/admin.crt --tls-private-key-file=<ROOT_DIR>/workdir/clusters/<CLUSTER_NAME>/pki/admin.key ><ROOT_DIR>/workdir/clusters/<CLUSTER_NAME>/logs/kube-apiserver.log 2>&1 &
echo $! ><ROOT_DIR>/workdir/clusters/<CLUSTER_NAME>/pids/kube-apiserver.pid
cd <ROOT_DIR>/workdir/clusters/<CLUSTER_NAME> && kube-controller-manager --authorization-always-allow-paths=/healthz,/readyz,/livez,/metrics --bind-address=0.0.0.0 --kubeconfig=<ROOT_DIR>/workdir/clusters/<CLUSTER_NAME>/kubeconfig.yaml --node-monitor-grace-period=3m20s --node-monitor-period=25s --root-ca-file=<ROOT_DIR>/workdir/clusters/<CLUSTER_NAME>/pki/ca.crt --secure-port=32763 --service-account-private-key-file=<ROOT_DIR>/workdir/clusters/<CLUSTER_NAME>/pki/admin.key ><ROOT_DIR>/workdir/clusters/<CLUSTER_NAME>/logs/kube-controller-manager.log 2>&1 &
echo $! ><ROOT_DIR>/workdir/clusters/<CLUSTER_NAME>/pids/kube-controller-manager.pid
cd <ROOT_DIR>/workdir/clusters/<CLUSTER_NAME> && kube-scheduler --authorization-always-allow-paths=/healthz,/readyz,/livez,/metrics --bind-address=0.0.0.0 --kubeconfig=<ROOT_DIR>/workdir/clusters/<CLUSTER_NAME>/kubeconfig.yaml --secure-port=32762 ><ROOT_DIR>/workdir/clusters/<CLUSTER_NAME>/logs/kube-scheduler.log 2>&1 &
echo $! ><ROOT_DIR>/workdir/clusters/<CLUSTER_NAME>/pids/kube-scheduler.pid
cd <ROOT_DIR>/workdir/clusters/<CLUSTER_NAME> && kwok-controller --config=<ROOT_DIR>/workdir/clusters/<CLUSTER_NAME>/kwok.yaml --kubeconfig=<ROOT_DIR>/workdir/clusters/<CLUSTER_NAME>/kubeconfig.yaml --manage-all-nodes=true --node-ip= --node-lease-duration-seconds=200 --node-name=localhost --node-port=10247 --server-address=0.0.0.0:10247 --tls-cert-file=<ROOT_DIR>/workdir/clusters/<CLUSTER_NAME>/pki/admin.crt --tls-private-key-file=<ROOT_DIR>/workdir/clusters/<CLUSTER_NAME>/pki/admin.key ><ROOT_DIR>/workdir/clusters/<CLUSTER_NAME>/logs/kwok-controller.log 2>&1 &
echo $! ><ROOT_DIR>/workdir/clusters/<CLUSTER_NAME>/pids/kwok-controller.pid
cd <ROOT_DIR>/workdir/clusters/<CLUSTER_NAME> && metrics-server --authentication-kubeconfig=<ROOT_DIR>/workdir/clusters/<CLUSTER_NAME>/kubeconfig.yaml --authorization-kubeconfig=<ROOT_DIR>/workdir/clusters/<CLUSTER_NAME>/kubeconfig.yaml --bind-address=0.0.0.0 --kubeconfig=<ROOT_DIR>/workdir/clusters/<CLUSTER_NAME>/kubeconfig.yaml --kubelet-insecure-tls --kubelet-preferred-address-types=InternalIP,ExternalIP,Hostname --kubelet-use-node-status-port --metric-resolution=15s --secure-port=32761 --tls-cert-file=<ROOT_DIR>/workdir/clusters/<CLUSTER_NAME>/pki/admin.crt --tls-private-key-file=<ROOT_DIR>/workdir/clusters/<CLUSTER_NAME>/pki/admin.key ><ROOT_DIR>/workdir/clusters/<CLUSTER_NAME>/logs/metrics-server.log 2>&1 &
echo $! ><ROOT_DIR>/workdir/clusters/<CLUSTER_NAME>/pids/metrics-server.pid
